rule: The output must never consist of only one word, and it must represent an invalid part-of-speech tag or any unaccepted option other than "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
input: sentence: She does not like mondays., word: mondays
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a part-of-speech tag, which is a valid tag from the provided list. It adheres to the instruction of returning only the tag.
OK
